[ library(xml) | Third Party Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

xml_parse(?Chars, ?Document)

Parse or generate XML documents
Chars
List of characters
Document
Document as structured term

Calling Modes

  • xml_parse(+, -)
  • xml_parse(-, +)

See Also

xml_parse / 3, xml_subterm / 2, xml_pp / 1
